content: Hi, this is Marvin Greenberg, marvin@1up.health. I was going to start trying to connect one of out client apps to the care evolution server for scenario #1. I'm just wondering about the "connect" part of connectathon. Is this zulib the main way to interact with others? I saw a reference to some video conference rooms, but can't find that link
@Marvin Greenberg asking questions here is fine (personally I won't be on Zoom most of the time)
